name: Unknown Town
description:
UnkownTown is a small action-shooter game where the player starts out in an unfamiliar town just after escaping from a mental hospital. 

This was originally a game jam game. Unfortunately, we did not make the deadline but we decided to finish and upload it anyway. 

Controls

Controls are displayed in the table below .

Move W, A, S, D Sprint Hold left shift ShootLeft mouse button Aim Right mouse button ReloadRJumpSpacePause game Escape
Directions

1. Download.

2. Unzip.

3. Run "UnknownTown.exe" executable.

Enjoy

Credits

Larra Snyder - Producer

Nick Scrivanich - Programmer

Royal Codes - Programmer
